com.pfc.android.archcomponent.adapters

Class ArrivalAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ArrivalAdapter.Holder>
      • com.pfc.android.archcomponent.adapters.ArrivalAdapter

  • public class ArrivalAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ArrivalAdapter.Holder>
    ArrivalAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter

    This Adapter is in charge of the interface elements that are showing in every recycler view for the detail fragments. Because your adapter subclasses RecyclerView.Adapter, you need to add the following methods:

    • 1.- getItemCount()
    • 2.- onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup parent, int viewType)
    • 3.- onBindViewHolder(Holder holder, int position)

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ana San Juan
